# HNL - Enterprise Infrastructure, Energy & IT Solutions in Pakistan
# Website: https://hnl.com.pk
# Last Updated: January 2025

## About HNL
HNL (Hitech Network Pvt. Ltd.) is Pakistan's leading enterprise service provider established in 2004. With 2,000+ employees and 144+ offices nationwide, HNL delivers integrated solutions across telecom infrastructure, energy & power, and software/cloud/AI services.

Tagline: Energy Anytime Anywhere
Headquarters: 44 Tipu Block, New Garden Town, Lahore, Pakistan
Phone: +92-42-35761999
WhatsApp: +92-300-8426299
Email: info@hnl.com.pk

## Service Divisions

### 1. Telecom Infrastructure
URL: https://hnl.com.pk/telecom-infrastructure
- Fiber Rollout: End-to-end fiber optic network deployment
- Civil Works: Trenching, duct laying, manhole construction
- Site Integration: BTS/tower installation and commissioning
- Operation & Maintenance: 24/7 preventive and corrective maintenance
- NOC Monitoring: Real-time network operations center services

### 2. Energy & Power Solutions
URL: https://hnl.com.pk/energy-power
- Diesel Generators: Mission-critical backup power (10kVA to 3000kVA+)
  - AGG Power: Authorized distributor in Pakistan
  - Perkins Engines: Premium power solutions
- BESS (Battery Energy Storage): Lithium-ion storage systems
- Hybrid Power Systems: Solar + diesel + battery integration
- EPC Project Solutions: Turnkey power infrastructure projects
- Energy O&M: Preventive maintenance, fuel management, monitoring

### 3. Software, Cloud & AI
URL: https://hnl.com.pk/software-cloud-ai
- Cloud Migration: AWS/Azure/GCP migration and optimization
- Enterprise IT Services: Network design, cybersecurity, IT support
- AI Agents: Custom AI automation for business processes
- Big Data Analytics: Data warehousing, BI, predictive analytics
- ICT Infrastructure: Data center setup, server infrastructure

## Products

### Diesel Generators
- AGG Power A-Series: Small (10-50kVA), Medium (50-250kVA)
- Perkins P-Series: Small, Medium, Large (up to 3000kVA)
- Applications: Telecom sites, data centers, hospitals, industrial plants

### Solar Solutions
- Residential: 3kW-10kW home solar systems
- Commercial: 10kW-100kW business installations
- Industrial: 100kW-5MW large-scale projects
- Hybrid: Solar + battery + grid integration

## Industries Served
- Telecom Operators: Jazz, Telenor, Zong, Ufone, PTCL
- Energy Sector: Grid infrastructure, power generation
- Enterprise: Banking, retail, healthcare IT
- Government: Public sector infrastructure projects
- Manufacturing: Industrial automation, power solutions
- Banking & Finance: Data centers, branch connectivity

## Geographic Coverage
Primary Market: Pakistan (nationwide operations)
Regional Offices: Lahore (HQ), Karachi, Islamabad, Faisalabad, Multan, Peshawar, Quetta
Operating Cities: 20+ cities with field presence
Total Offices: 144+ locations

## Key Differentiators
1. Pakistan-first expertise with deep local knowledge
2. Integrated solutions across infrastructure, power, and IT
3. 24/7 operations and technical support
4. 20+ years of proven track record
5. Partnerships with global brands (AGG Power, Perkins, Centiel)
6. ISO certified operations
